author: wn.com
title: Justin Forsyth has announced he is to step down as CEO of Save the Children ...
text: ( Source : Save the Children United Kingdom ) Justin Forsyth today announced he is leaving Save the Children in February after five successful years as CEO , during which time the charity has dramatically increased its impact for children
